article.headline: Aurora Cannabis co-Founder and ex-CEO Terry Booth retires from board
article.body: Aurora Cannabis Inc. ACB, -1.37% ACB, -2.08% said Monday that co-Founder and former Chief Executive Terry Booth is retiring from its board. Booth was CEO of the Canadian cannabis company from December 2014 through February 2020 and served on the board since 2014. U.S.-listed hares were down 1.8% premarket and have fallen 52% in the year to date, while the Cannabis ETF THCX, +3.21% has and the S&p 500 SPX, +0.87% has fallen 24% and the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% has fallen 7%.
